<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><Highlight kind="normal">    LinkSection = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/section/#a7fc2ecb5845075b45e735b711b1403af"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/section/#a7fc2ecb5845075b45e735b711b1403af">Section::finalize</a>() &#123; this-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a6d76f000182407983c28aab811228fcf">Link</a> = LinkSection ? <Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GnuDebugLinkSection::init(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/objcopy/#a88eeb89876019c1a9f2540275fb96457a0b27918290ff5323bea1e3b78a9cf04e">File</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><Highlight kind="normal">  FileName = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#aa56d25bb5127dd7a5831c25764f76cbe">sys::path::filename</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/objcopy/#a88eeb89876019c1a9f2540275fb96457a0b27918290ff5323bea1e3b78a9cf04e">File</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The format for the .gnu&#95;debuglink starts with the file name and is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// followed by a null terminator and then the CRC32 of the file. The CRC32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// should be 4 byte aligned. So we add the FileName size, a 1 for the null</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// byte, and then finally push the size to alignment and add 4</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(FileName.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>() + 1, 4) + 4;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The CRC32 will only be aligned if we align the whole section.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> = 4;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a822872b798744d6689b1b4cc615417a2">OriginalType</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#ab23570002b1ab10a685e8f349da3ddbca18ae5a64ac74a4265698b956bc797b32">ELF::SHT&#95;PROGBITS</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a6ca324c9086862d837e0593199d1e58e">Name</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.gnu&#95;debuglink&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For sections not found in segments, OriginalOffset is only used to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// establish the order that sections should go in. By using the maximum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// possible offset we cause this section to wind up at the end.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a175b3cb20485be4d75ac2e380dd3dae8">OriginalOffset</a> = std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;::max();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/gnudebuglinksection/#a3b71f2bc7b412abf71f3a0d18e6d3261"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/gnudebuglinksection/#a3b71f2bc7b412abf71f3a0d18e6d3261">GnuDebugLinkSection::GnuDebugLinkSection</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/objcopy/#a88eeb89876019c1a9f2540275fb96457a0b27918290ff5323bea1e3b78a9cf04e">File</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each section that remains alive, we want to remove the dead references.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This either might update the content of the section (e.g. remove symbols</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2239"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from symbol table that belongs to removed section) or trigger an error if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a live section critically depends on a section being removed somehow</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2241"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (e.g. the removed section is referenced by a relocation).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2242"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;KeepSec : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a341215803e83773a3e97860dc291f121">make&#95;range</a>(std::begin(Sections), Iter)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2243"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> E = KeepSec-&gt;removeSectionReferences(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2244"><Highlight kind="normal">            AllowBrokenLinks, &#91;&amp;RemoveSections&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &#42;Sec) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2245"><Highlight kind="normal">              return RemoveSections.find(Sec) != RemoveSections.end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2246"><Highlight kind="normal">            &#125;))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2247"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> E;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2248"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2249"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2250"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Transfer removed sections into the Object RemovedSections container for use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2251"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// later.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2252"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::move(Iter, Sections.end(), std::back&#95;inserter(RemovedSections));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2253"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now finally get rid of them all together.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2254"><Highlight kind="normal">  Sections.erase(Iter, std::end(Sections));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2255"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2259"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;SectionBase &#42;, SectionBase &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;FromTo) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2261"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Lhs-&gt;Index &lt; Rhs-&gt;Index;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2319"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2320"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Orders segments such that if x = y-&gt;ParentSegment then y comes before x.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2321" lineLink="#a5299c97aa0af6f626985eb7a5882746a"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a5299c97aa0af6f626985eb7a5882746a">orderSegments</a>(std::vector&lt;Segment &#42;&gt; &amp;Segments) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2322"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a076f93c387f454f0db13d4bc7d4e7f9c">llvm::stable&#95;sort</a>(Segments, <a href="#a5fc44e403374b7c21a88d67ffe88edc6">compareSegmentsByOffset</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2323"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2324"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2325"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This function finds a consistent layout for a list of segments starting from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2326"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an Offset. It assumes that Segments have been sorted by orderSegments and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2327"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// returns an Offset one past the end of the last segment.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2328" lineLink="#a57752aa0e0e6281fecc0fe16dc609cd5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#a57752aa0e0e6281fecc0fe16dc609cd5">layoutSegments</a>(std::vector&lt;Segment &#42;&gt; &amp;Segments,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2329"><Highlight kind="normal">                               uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2330"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a864e071375fea140a5441a243372ff81">llvm::is&#95;sorted</a>(Segments, <a href="#a5fc44e403374b7c21a88d67ffe88edc6">compareSegmentsByOffset</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2331"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The only way a segment should move is if a section was between two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2332"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// segments and that section was removed. If that section isn&#39;t in a segment</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2333"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then it&#39;s acceptable, but not ideal, to simply move it to after the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2334"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// segments. So we can simply layout segments one after the other accounting</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2335"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for alignment.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2336"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a> &#42;Seg : Segments) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2337"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We assume that segments have been ordered by OriginalOffset and Index</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2338"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// such that a parent segment will always come before a child segment in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2339"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// OrderedSegments. This means that the Offset of the ParentSegment should</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2340"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// already be set and we can set our offset relative to it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2341"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a47a40ff6267a0d5a1680e6564432a18c">ParentSegment</a> != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2342"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a> &#42;Parent = Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a47a40ff6267a0d5a1680e6564432a18c">ParentSegment</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2343"><Highlight kind="normal">      Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2344"><Highlight kind="normal">          Parent-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a> + Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a7e21fcbce74455cf2bd3dd2eeeebacd5">OriginalOffset</a> - Parent-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a7e21fcbce74455cf2bd3dd2eeeebacd5">OriginalOffset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2345"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2347"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, std::max&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;(Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a7d4c0fbb1c341d6b45b7e7bf3c175477">Align</a>, 1), Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a88267282dde7a19f1b5fc3b8d75d2c6a">VAddr</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2352"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2353"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2354"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This function finds a consistent layout for a list of sections. It assumes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2355"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that the -&gt;ParentSegment of each section has already been laid out. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2356"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// supplied starting Offset is used for the starting offset of any section that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2357"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// does not have a ParentSegment. It returns either the offset given if all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2358"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sections had a ParentSegment or an offset one past the last section if there</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2359"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// was a section that didn&#39;t have a ParentSegment.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2360"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Range&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2361" lineLink="#a782bd3507c3ce21c87bc884e7211afe3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#a782bd3507c3ce21c87bc884e7211afe3">layoutSections</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a> Sections, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2362"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now the offset of every segment has been set we can assign the offsets</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2363"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of each section. For sections that are covered by a segment we should use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2364"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the segment&#39;s original offset and the section&#39;s original offset to compute</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2365"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the offset from the start of the segment. Using the offset from the start</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2366"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the segment we can assign a new offset to the section. For sections not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2367"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// covered by segments we can just bump Offset to the next valid location.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2368"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// While it is not necessary, layout the sections in the order based on their</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2369"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// original offsets to resemble the input file as close as possible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2370"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;SectionBase &#42;&gt; OutOfSegmentSections;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2371"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t Index = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2372"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Sec : Sections) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2373"><Highlight kind="normal">    Sec.Index = Index++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2374"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Sec.ParentSegment != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2375"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a> = &#42;Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a47a40ff6267a0d5a1680e6564432a18c">ParentSegment</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2376"><Highlight kind="normal">      Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2377"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a> + (Sec.OriginalOffset - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a7e21fcbce74455cf2bd3dd2eeeebacd5">OriginalOffset</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2413"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;FirstSec = Sec-&gt;ParentSegment &amp;&amp; Sec-&gt;ParentSegment-&gt;Type == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#a4c1b3bf29b3c86c8d11b6708ff244669a15ee14963e8cb0e95f10994bbd35a050">PT&#95;LOAD</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2414"><Highlight kind="normal">                         ? Sec-&gt;ParentSegment-&gt;firstSection()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2415"><Highlight kind="normal">                         : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2416"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2417"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The first section in a PT&#95;LOAD has to have congruent offset and address</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2418"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// modulo the alignment, which usually equals the maximum page size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2419"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FirstSec &amp;&amp; FirstSec == Sec)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2420"><Highlight kind="normal">      Off = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(Off, Sec-&gt;ParentSegment-&gt;Align, Sec-&gt;Addr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2421"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2422"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sh&#95;offset is not significant for SHT&#95;NOBITS sections, but the congruence</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2423"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// rule must be followed if it is the first section in a PT&#95;LOAD. Do not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2424"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// advance Off.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2425"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Sec-&gt;Type == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#ab23570002b1ab10a685e8f349da3ddbca45212cec20bcd4ca3449dcd8654010ac">SHT&#95;NOBITS</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2426"><Highlight kind="normal">      Sec-&gt;Offset = Off;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2427"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2428"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2429"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2430"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!FirstSec) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2431"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FirstSec being nullptr generally means that Sec does not have the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2432"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SHF&#95;ALLOC flag.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2433"><Highlight kind="normal">      Off = Sec-&gt;Align ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(Off, Sec-&gt;Align) : Off;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2434"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FirstSec != Sec) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2435"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The offset is relative to the first section in the PT&#95;LOAD segment. Use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2436"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sh&#95;offset for non-SHF&#95;ALLOC sections.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2437"><Highlight kind="normal">      Off = Sec-&gt;OriginalOffset - FirstSec-&gt;OriginalOffset + FirstSec-&gt;Offset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2438"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2439"><Highlight kind="normal">    Sec-&gt;Offset = Off;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2440"><Highlight kind="normal">    Off += Sec-&gt;Size;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2441"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2442"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Off;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2443"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2444"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2445"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Rewrite p&#95;offset and p&#95;filesz of non-PT&#95;PHDR segments after sh&#95;offset values</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2446"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// have been updated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2447" lineLink="#a7db0cfaec1a4fb39e28b687ff68dcaec"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#a7db0cfaec1a4fb39e28b687ff68dcaec">layoutSegmentsForOnlyKeepDebug</a>(std::vector&lt;Segment &#42;&gt; &amp;Segments,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2448"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               uint64&#95;t HdrEnd) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2449"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t MaxOffset = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2450"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment">Segment</a> &#42;Seg : Segments) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2451"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a5db127e6cf62bb2d7c9ced84cdbb8531">Type</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#a4c1b3bf29b3c86c8d11b6708ff244669af95333de0bb9b94266d0aef1869a4a17">PT&#95;PHDR</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2452"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2453"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2454"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The segment offset is generally the offset of the first section.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2455"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2456"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For a segment containing no section (see sectionWithinSegment), if it has</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2457"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a parent segment, copy the parent segment&#39;s offset field. This works for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2458"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// empty PT&#95;TLS. If no parent segment, use 0: the segment is not useful for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2459"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// debugging anyway.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2460"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &#42;FirstSec = Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a721a11215fa5edc76768ad33f46064f0">firstSection</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2461"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2462"><Highlight kind="normal">        FirstSec ? FirstSec-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a9ab60ac6df1d07f5866f34453f9efe15">Offset</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2463"><Highlight kind="normal">                 : (Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a47a40ff6267a0d5a1680e6564432a18c">ParentSegment</a> ? <Link id="l02464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2464"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t FileSize = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2465"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &#42;Sec : Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ae73f605c85ed9995737a565aa663bd3c">Sections</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2466"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = Sec-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a44c3c5507dfeccfdb9f1ba5164fed1fc">Type</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#ab23570002b1ab10a685e8f349da3ddbca45212cec20bcd4ca3449dcd8654010ac">SHT&#95;NOBITS</a> ? 0 : Sec-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a6fefaf0cf6568001708fc6f9b862687a">Size</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2467"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Sec-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a9ab60ac6df1d07f5866f34453f9efe15">Offset</a> + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2469"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2470"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2471"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the segment includes EHDR and program headers, don&#39;t make it smaller</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2472"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// than the headers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2473"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a> &lt; HdrEnd &amp;&amp; HdrEnd &lt;= Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a5db1dbd2d6c37e72890bab3d1523d25d">FileSize</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2474"><Highlight kind="normal">      FileSize += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> - Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2475"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2476"><Highlight kind="normal">      FileSize = std::max(FileSize, HdrEnd - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2477"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2479"><Highlight kind="normal">    Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#ac6c2aa733d3af071d31065d0090ff5c6">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2480"><Highlight kind="normal">    Seg-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/segment/#a5db1dbd2d6c37e72890bab3d1523d25d">FileSize</a> = FileSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2481"><Highlight kind="normal">    MaxOffset = std::max(MaxOffset, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + FileSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2508"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OnlyKeepDebug) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2509"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For --only-keep-debug, the sections that did not preserve contents were</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2510"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// changed to SHT&#95;NOBITS. We now rewrite sh&#95;offset fields of sections, and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2511"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then rewrite p&#95;offset/p&#95;filesz of program headers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2512"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t HdrEnd =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2513"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Elf&#95;Ehdr) + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">llvm::size</a>(Obj.segments()) &#42; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Elf&#95;Phdr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2514"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="#a78ce20255776ffc35a2da78ba3f19892">layoutSectionsForOnlyKeepDebug</a>(Obj, HdrEnd);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2515"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2516"><Highlight kind="normal">                      <a href="#a7db0cfaec1a4fb39e28b687ff68dcaec">layoutSegmentsForOnlyKeepDebug</a>(OrderedSegments, HdrEnd));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2517"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2518"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Offset is used as the start offset of the first segment to be laid out.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2519"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since the ELF Header (ElfHdrSegment) must be at the start of the file,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2520"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we start at offset 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2521"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="#a57752aa0e0e6281fecc0fe16dc609cd5">layoutSegments</a>(OrderedSegments, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2522"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="#a782bd3507c3ce21c87bc884e7211afe3">layoutSections</a>(Obj.sections(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2523"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2524"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we need to write the section header table out then we need to align the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2525"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Offset so that SHOffset is valid.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2526"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (WriteSectionHeaders)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2527"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Elf&#95;Addr));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2528"><Highlight kind="normal">  Obj.SHOff = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2529"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2530"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2531"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ELFT&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ELFWriter&lt;ELFT&gt;::totalSize()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2532"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We already have the section header offset so we can calculate the total</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2533"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// size by just adding up the size of each section header.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2534"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!WriteSectionHeaders)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2536"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShdrCount = Obj.sections().size() + 1; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Includes null shdr.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2537"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Obj.SHOff + ShdrCount &#42; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Elf&#95;Shdr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2538"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2539"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2540" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/elfwriter/#afba8988590ae275a08b0efd42c27d274"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ELFT&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/elfwriter/#afba8988590ae275a08b0efd42c27d274">ELFWriter&lt;ELFT&gt;::write</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2541"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Segment data must be written first, so that the ELF header and program</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2542"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// header tables can overwrite it, if covered by a segment.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2543"><Highlight kind="normal">  writeSegmentData();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2544"><Highlight kind="normal">  writeEhdr();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2545"><Highlight kind="normal">  writePhdrs();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2652"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instance, symbol names are not added as new symbols are added. This means</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2653"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that some sections, like .strtab, don&#39;t yet have their final size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2654"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/writer/#ad4df0d78579a2c7fae094d28ce9c3db8">Obj</a>.SymbolTable != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2655"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/writer/#ad4df0d78579a2c7fae094d28ce9c3db8">Obj</a>.SymbolTable-&gt;prepareForLayout();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2705"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2706"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2707"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SectionsToWrite.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a58dc840fc84420b7f0b773794b8101c1">front</a>()-&gt;Offset == 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2708"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2711"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> Err = Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#afe600f2ec9bce03d7590bf30bb4aedc9">accept</a>(&#42;SecWriter))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2712"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Err;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2713"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (GapFill == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2714"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2715"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t PadOffset = (i &lt; SectionsToWrite.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() - 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2716"><Highlight kind="normal">                             ? SectionsToWrite&#91;i + 1&#93;-&gt;Offset</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2717"><Highlight kind="normal">                             : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/writer/#afa60fbd08f1b1c6a7b9ce0b1e16ce6cb">Buf</a>-&gt;getBufferSize();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2718"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PadOffset &lt;= Buf-&gt;getBufferSize());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2719"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a9ab60ac6df1d07f5866f34453f9efe15">Offset</a> + Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a6fefaf0cf6568001708fc6f9b862687a">Size</a> &lt;= PadOffset);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2720"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::fill(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/writer/#afa60fbd08f1b1c6a7b9ce0b1e16ce6cb">Buf</a>-&gt;getBufferStart() + Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a9ab60ac6df1d07f5866f34453f9efe15">Offset</a> + Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase/#a6fefaf0cf6568001708fc6f9b862687a">Size</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2721"><Highlight kind="normal">              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/writer/#afa60fbd08f1b1c6a7b9ce0b1e16ce6cb">Buf</a>-&gt;getBufferStart() + PadOffset, GapFill);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2722"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2723"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2724"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Implement direct writing to the output stream (without intermediate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2725"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// memory buffer Buf).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2726"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/writer/#a6eee844a4c9e81d73a4771d162451471">Out</a>.write(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/writer/#afa60fbd08f1b1c6a7b9ce0b1e16ce6cb">Buf</a>-&gt;getBufferStart(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/writer/#afa60fbd08f1b1c6a7b9ce0b1e16ce6cb">Buf</a>-&gt;getBufferSize());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2727"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2728"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2729"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2730" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/binarywriter/#a5b9da0f3636f00c8eb9dca28bf21e606"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/binarywriter/#a5b9da0f3636f00c8eb9dca28bf21e606">BinaryWriter::finalize</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2731"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the section LMA based on its sh&#95;offset and the containing segment&#39;s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2732"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// p&#95;offset and p&#95;paddr. Also compute the minimum LMA of all non-empty</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2733"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sections as MinAddr. In the output, the contents between address 0 and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2734"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MinAddr will be skipped.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2735"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t MinAddr = <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2736"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &amp;Sec : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/writer/#ad4df0d78579a2c7fae094d28ce9c3db8">Obj</a>.allocSections()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2737"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Sec.ParentSegment != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2738"><Highlight kind="normal">      Sec.Addr =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2739"><Highlight kind="normal">          Sec.Offset - Sec.ParentSegment-&gt;Offset + Sec.ParentSegment-&gt;PAddr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2740"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Sec.Type != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#ab23570002b1ab10a685e8f349da3ddbca45212cec20bcd4ca3449dcd8654010ac">SHT&#95;NOBITS</a> &amp;&amp; Sec.Size &gt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2741"><Highlight kind="normal">      MinAddr = std::min(MinAddr, Sec.Addr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2742"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2743"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2744"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now that every section has been laid out we just need to compute the total</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2745"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// file size. This might not be the same as the offset returned by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2746"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// layoutSections, because we want to truncate the last segment to the end of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2747"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// its last non-empty section, to match GNU objcopy&#39;s behaviour.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2748"><Highlight kind="normal">  TotalSize = PadTo &gt; MinAddr ? PadTo - MinAddr : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2749"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/sectionbase">SectionBase</a> &amp;Sec : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/elf/writer/#ad4df0d78579a2c7fae094d28ce9c3db8">Obj</a>.allocSections())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2750"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Sec.Type != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#ab23570002b1ab10a685e8f349da3ddbca45212cec20bcd4ca3449dcd8654010ac">SHT&#95;NOBITS</a> &amp;&amp; Sec.Size &gt; 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2751"><Highlight kind="normal">      Sec.Offset = Sec.Addr - MinAddr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2752"><Highlight kind="normal">      TotalSize = std::max(TotalSize, Sec.Offset + Sec.Size);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2753"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
